entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 20 April 2023
